db:abstract.db:para: The QCollatorSortKey class can be used to speed up string collation.

db:note.db:para: All functions in this class are reentrant.

db:listitem.db:para: QCollatorSortKey is part of i18nClasses for string dataImplicitly Shared Classes

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QCollatorSortKey class is always created by QCollator::sortKey() and is used for fast strings collation, for example when collating many strings.

db:section.db:title: QCollatorSortKey::QCollatorSortKey(const QCollatorSortKey &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of the other collator key.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept, since 6.8] QCollatorSortKey::QCollatorSortKey(QCollatorSortKey &&other)
db:section.db:para: Move-constructs a new QCollatorSortKey from other.

db:note.db:para: The moved-from object other is placed in a partially-formed state, in which the only valid operations are destruction and assignment of a new value.

db:section.db:para: This function was introduced in Qt 6.8.

db:section.db:title: int QCollatorSortKey::compare(const QCollatorSortKey &otherKey) const
db:section.db:para: Compares this key to otherKey, which must have been created by the same QCollator's sortKey() as this key. The comparison is performed in accordance with that QCollator's sort order.
Returns a negative value if this key sorts before otherKey, 0 if the two keys are equal or a positive value if this key sorts after otherKey.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] void QCollatorSortKey::swap(QCollatorSortKey &other)
db:section.db:para: Swaps this collator key with other. This operation is very fast and never fails.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QCollatorSortKey &QCollatorSortKey::operator=(QCollatorSortKey &&other)
db:section.db:para: Move-assigns other to this QCollatorSortKey instance.

db:note.db:para: The moved-from object other is placed in a partially-formed state, in which the only valid operations are destruction and assignment of a new value.

db:section.db:title: QCollatorSortKey &QCollatorSortKey::operator=(const QCollatorSortKey &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns other to this collator key.

db:section.db:title: bool operator<(const QCollatorSortKey &lhs, const QCollatorSortKey &rhs)
db:section.db:para: Both keys must have been created by the same QCollator's sortKey(). Returns true if lhs should be sorted before rhs, according to the QCollator that created them; otherwise returns false.
